channel.title: [PI] Item Requirements

item.title: [PI] Item Requirements
item.dc:creator: @Soviet Soviet
item.description:
@Soviet wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:6, topic:404257”]I honestly don’t see why it isn’t working…
Unless you have the wrong cape id?[/quote]

I tried to make it like this:

if (itemName.contains("dungeoneering")) { c.craftingLevelReq = 99; }

and actually worked

But anyway, thank you very much

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Item Requirements
item.dc:creator: @Soviet Soviet
item.description:
@Soviet wrote:

Nop still not working :S

tried only with crafting

itemRequirements:

[code]if(Config.itemRequirements) {
if (targetSlot != 3) {
if(c.defenceLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) < c.defenceLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a defence level of “+c.defenceLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}
if(c.rangeLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) < c.rangeLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a range level of “+c.rangeLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}
if(c.magicLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) < c.magicLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a magic level of “+c.magicLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}
if(c.craftingLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.playerLevel[12] < c.craftingLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a Crafting level of " + c.craftingLevelReq + " to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

				}
				if(targetSlot == 3) {
					if(c.attackLevelReq > 0) {
						if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]) < c.attackLevelReq) {
							c.sendMessage("You need an attack level of "+c.attackLevelReq+" to wield this weapon.");
							canWearItem = false;
						}
					}
					if(c.rangeLevelReq > 0) {
						if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) < c.rangeLevelReq) {
							c.sendMessage("You need a range level of "+c.rangeLevelReq+" to wield this weapon.");
							canWearItem = false;
						}
					}
					if(c.magicLevelReq > 0) {
						if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) < c.magicLevelReq) {
							c.sendMessage("You need a magic level of "+c.magicLevelReq+" to wield this weapon.");
							canWearItem = false;
						}
					}
          if(c.craftingLevelReq > 0) {
                                                    if(c.playerLevel[12] < c.craftingLevelReq) {
                                                            c.sendMessage("You need a Crafting level of " + c.craftingLevelReq + " to wear this item.");
                                                            canWearItem = false;
                                                    }
                                            }

				}
			}[/code]

Case:

case 19709: c.craftingLevelReq = 99; break;

and the : public boolean wearItem(int wearID, int slot) {

if(c.isDonator == 0) for(int i : donItems) if(wearID == i) { c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to wear this item."); return false; } if(c.craftingLevelReq > 0) { if(c.playerLevel[12] < c.craftingLevelReq) { c.sendMessage("You need a Crafting level of " + c.craftingLevelReq + " to wear this item."); canWearItem = false; } }

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Item Requirements
item.dc:creator: @Soviet Soviet
item.description:
@Soviet wrote:

Do you have itemRequirements set to true?

if(c.attackLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]) < c.attackLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a attack level of “+c.attackLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false; <------- this thing on true?

Ok i don’t think that is… where do I set them?

item.title: [PI] Item Requirements
item.dc:creator: @Soviet Soviet
item.description:
@Soviet wrote:

still not working

[code]if(Config.itemRequirements) {
if(targetSlot != 3) {
if(c.defenceLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) < c.defenceLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a defence level of “+c.defenceLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}
if(c.rangeLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) < c.rangeLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a range level of “+c.rangeLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}
if(c.magicLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) < c.magicLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a magic level of “+c.magicLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}
if(c.attackLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]) < c.attackLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a attack level of “+c.attackLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.strengthLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]) < c.strengthLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a strength level of “+c.strengthLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.defenceLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) < c.defenceLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a defence level of “+c.defenceLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}
if(c.rangeLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) < c.rangeLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a ranged level of “+c.rangeLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.prayerLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) < c.prayerLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a prayer level of “+c.prayerLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.magicLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) < c.magicLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a magic level of “+c.magicLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.runecraftLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[20]) < c.runecraftLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a runecrafting level of “+c.runecraftLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.hitpointLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]) < c.hitpointLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a hitpoints level of “+c.hitpointLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.agilityLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[16]) < c.agilityLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a agility level of “+c.agilityLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.herbloreLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[15]) < c.herbloreLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a herblore level of “+c.herbloreLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.thevingLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[17]) < c.thevingLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a theving level of “+c.thevingLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.craftingLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[12]) < c.craftingLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a crafting level of “+c.craftingLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.slayerLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[18]) < c.slayerLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a slayer level of “+c.slayerLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.hunterLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[21]) < c.hunterLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a hunter level of “+c.hunterLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.miningLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[14]) < c.miningLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a mining level of “+c.miningLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.cookingLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[7]) < c.cookingLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a cooking level of “+c.cookingLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.firemakeLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[11]) < c.firemakeLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a firemaking level of “+c.firemakeLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.wcLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[8]) < c.wcLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a woodcutting level of “+c.wcLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.farmingLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[19]) < c.farmingLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a farming level of “+c.farmingLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

				}

[/code]

item.description:
@Soviet wrote:

if(c.defenceLevelReq > 0) {

item.title: [PI] Item Requirements
item.dc:creator: @Soviet Soviet
item.description:
@Soviet wrote:

In here:

if(Config.itemRequirements) { if(targetSlot != 3) { <---- if(c.defenceLevelReq > 0) { if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) < c.defenceLevelReq) { c.sendMessage("You need a defence level of "+c.defenceLevelReq+" to wear this item."); canWearItem = false; } } if(c.rangeLevelReq > 0) { if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) < c.rangeLevelReq) { c.sendMessage("You need a range level of "+c.rangeLevelReq+" to wear this item."); canWearItem = false; } } if(c.magicLevelReq > 0) { if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) < c.magicLevelReq) { c.sendMessage("You need a magic level of "+c.magicLevelReq+" to wear this item."); canWearItem = false; } } } if(targetSlot == 3) { if(c.attackLevelReq > 0) { if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]) < c.attackLevelReq) { c.sendMessage("You need an attack level of "+c.attackLevelReq+" to wield this weapon."); canWearItem = false; } } if(c.rangeLevelReq > 0) { if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) < c.rangeLevelReq) { c.sendMessage("You need a range level of "+c.rangeLevelReq+" to wield this weapon."); canWearItem = false; } } if(c.magicLevelReq > 0) { if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) < c.magicLevelReq) { c.sendMessage("You need a magic level of "+c.magicLevelReq+" to wield this weapon."); canWearItem = false; } } } }

I need to add the:

if(c.magicLevelReq > 0) { if(c.playerLevel[6] < c.magicLevelReq) { c.sendMessage("You need a magic level of " + c.magicLevelReq + " to wear this item."); canWearItem = false; } } if(c.cookingLevelReq > 0) { if(c.playerLevel[7] < c.cookingLevelReq) { c.sendMessage("You need a cooking level of " + c.cookingLevelReq + " to wear this item."); canWearItem = false; } } if(c.wcLevelReq > 0) { if(c.playerLevel[8] < c.wcLevelReq) { c.sendMessage("You need a woodcutting level of " + c.wcLevelReq + " to wear this item."); canWearItem = false; } } if(c.firemakeLevelReq > 0) { if(c.playerLevel[11] < c.firemakeLevelReq) { c.sendMessage("You need a firemaking level of " + c.firemakeLevelReq + " to wear this item."); canWearItem = false; } } if(c.craftingLevelReq > 0) { if(c.playerLevel[12] < c.craftingLevelReq) { c.sendMessage("You need a crafting level of " + c.craftingLevelReq + " to wear this item."); canWearItem = false; } }

and leave it like this?

[code]if(Config.itemRequirements) {
if(targetSlot != 3) { <----
if(c.defenceLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) < c.defenceLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a defence level of “+c.defenceLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}
if(c.rangeLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) < c.rangeLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a range level of “+c.rangeLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}
if(c.magicLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) < c.magicLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a magic level of “+c.magicLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}
if(c.attackLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]) < c.attackLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a attack level of “+c.attackLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.strengthLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]) < c.strengthLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a strength level of “+c.strengthLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.defenceLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) < c.defenceLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a defence level of “+c.defenceLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}
if(c.rangeLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) < c.rangeLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a ranged level of “+c.rangeLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.prayerLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) < c.prayerLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a prayer level of “+c.prayerLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.magicLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) < c.magicLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a magic level of “+c.magicLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.runecraftLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[20]) < c.runecraftLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a runecrafting level of “+c.runecraftLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.hitpointLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]) < c.hitpointLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a hitpoints level of “+c.hitpointLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}

if(c.agilityLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[16]) < c.agilityLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a agility level of “+c.agilityLevelReq+” to wear this item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}
}
if(targetSlot == 3) {
if(c.attackLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]) < c.attackLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need an attack level of “+c.attackLevelReq+” to wield this weapon.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}
if(c.rangeLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) < c.rangeLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a range level of “+c.rangeLevelReq+” to wield this weapon.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}
if(c.magicLevelReq > 0) {
if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) < c.magicLevelReq) {
c.sendMessage(“You need a magic level of “+c.magicLevelReq+” to wield this weapon.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}
}
}[/code]

item.title: [PI] Item Requirements
item.dc:creator: @Soviet Soviet
item.description:
@Soviet wrote:

				if(Config.itemRequirements) {
					if(targetSlot != 3) {  <----
						if(c.defenceLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) < c.defenceLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a defence level of "+c.defenceLevelReq+" to wear this item.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.rangeLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) < c.rangeLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a range level of "+c.rangeLevelReq+" to wear this item.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.magicLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) < c.magicLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a magic level of "+c.magicLevelReq+" to wear this item.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
					}
					if(targetSlot == 3) {
						if(c.attackLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]) < c.attackLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need an attack level of "+c.attackLevelReq+" to wield this weapon.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.rangeLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) < c.rangeLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a range level of "+c.rangeLevelReq+" to wield this weapon.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.magicLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) < c.magicLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a magic level of "+c.magicLevelReq+" to wield this weapon.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
					}
				}

item.title: [PI] Item Requirements
item.dc:creator: @Soviet Soviet
item.description:
@Soviet wrote:

public boolean wearItem(int wearID, int slot) { synchronized(c) { int targetSlot=0; if(targetSlot == 3) { c.usingSpecial = false; addSpecialBar(wearID); } boolean canWearItem = true; if(c.isDonator == 0) for(int i : donItems) if(wearID == i) { c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to wear this item."); return false; }

Here I add the

if(c.attackLevelReq > 0) { if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) < c.attackLevelReq) { c.sendMessage("You need a attack level of "+c.attackLevelReq+" to wear this item."); canWearItem = false; } }

public boolean wearItem(int wearID, int slot) { synchronized(c) { int targetSlot=0; if(targetSlot == 3) { c.usingSpecial = false; addSpecialBar(wearID); } boolean canWearItem = true; if(c.isDonator == 0) for(int i : donItems) if(wearID == i) { c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to wear this item."); return false; } if(c.attackLevelReq > 0) { if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) < c.attackLevelReq) { c.sendMessage("You need a attack level of "+c.attackLevelReq+" to wear this item."); canWearItem = false; } }

and leave the case 19709: like that?
